beer.beer_description: Made with our mates at the legendary Friend In Hand Hotel in Glebe, 'Friend In Haze' IPA is a 5.8% Hazy IPA . The citrus and stone fruit aromas greets you like when you meet your BFF at the pub; with the reliable group of hop mates Citra, Mosaic and Simcoe giving you the tropical hit you're craving. Best enjoyed with a true Friend In Haze.

user.bio: Never used to like beers until forced by a friend to drink Newcastle Brown Ale. Now, 26 years on I like hoppy IPAs

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 115 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 24!
